Articles.Content:
I have to say that they are nice to prove a point, but they still arent as well built as our own designs (although i think thats on purpose).

The stock shuttle isnt bad now (the 1.0.4 and 0.90 shuttle was terrible, it was unstable and had bad range/performance).

As for the rest, really the only stock craft that even now is good is the kerbal-X, that thing can go pretty far after the buff to the poodle (no clue when that was, but it made the X actually workable as a light payload lifter or mun vessel with some alterations to it).
